answers.answer: I had to do the 3hr test today and I had to drink the orange one, she put it in a cup of ice which makes it taste a little better. I started feeling pukish after I drank it, the after taste and brain freeze is what got me lol

Oh ya, the one I have to drink for 3 hrs test is way worst than the first one. So gross. And wanting to try the fruit punch favor was a big mistake, should had stick with the orange one. Got me running to the bathroom as soon as I was done. At least I pass so I won't have to deal with it until the next baby, lol.Good luck with your test :)
I passed the one hr test , but after the test was done I puked it all up -_-
I think the 3 hr one has double the sugar. I like the fruit punch but it was pretty tough to swallow at the end.

I had the drink then the test. Walked out to the carpark thinking oh no im going to spew. As I got to my car I spewed between my car and the next car. As I straightend up wiping my face I noticed a lady in the next car trying to eat a salad roll!! I opologised and went bright red.

question: Took my test today n man I literally had to hold in my vomit. I dont remember it being that nasty with my 1st. I so hope my test comes back negative cuz if I gotta do it again ill throw up.
title: Ugh gestational diabetes test :p
